stories.text:
Dear HN community,

I live in Germany::Berlin and work for a large multinational e-commerce company. Its share price dropped more than 70% last year. I specialize in backend/java.

Several questions: -=-= How can I analyze the financial stability of the company? Or at least gain some insight? -=-= What companies have some growth potential in 2022-2023? -=-= Do you expect many backend developers to lose their jobs in 2022-2023? -=-= What would be your strategy to develop your career (as backend developer)?

Thank you!
stories.title: Ask HN: What companies are likely to survive the coming recession?

stories.text: Using Mobile NFC as a replacement for RFID Cards. I need to carry separate cards for  office and my home. I can see android apps support reading of RFID Cards through NFC but not emit or act as card with card readers. I have tried few apps but not successful.
